name: Renamed
description:
Rename, transform and organize layer names of the entire page, a selection, or a certain layer type.

 

❖ Find & rename

Find and rename a specific layer(s).


  • Search for one word, combination of words or individual character.
  • For a strict match, tick the checkbox Case sensitive.
  • Leave Rename input blank to remove that you’ve been searching for.
  • Edit Apply to section to skip the renaming of particular layers. The inner layers of omitted items will also be skipped.

 

❖ Transform case

Modify the layer(s) name case.

 

  • Pick one of the 13 types of font cases. To name a few, Title Case, Sentence case, Header-Case, PascalCase, camelCase etc.
  • Use No case to reset the font case.
  • Edit Apply to section to skip the transformation of particular layers. The inner layers of omitted items will also be skipped.
